attributes.action: give Soldiers a pay rise on active duty and on non active duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
a "new" soldiers gets 16000£ a year when they finished training,but this is not what they get paid out after tax,ni there left with around 850£ a month which is minimum wage.Soldiers pay so much tax that it is impossible to raise your family with that kind of money.

A traffic warden,post office staff,care worker,shelf filler get more money to take home then a soldier does,fair enough as soon as you get a rank your pay goes up,but so do there outgoings,like mess bills,and mess clothing and of course tax and ni.

how come banks,the goverment,football players get paid millions a year doing nothing what benifits people,but the Soldiers that are risking there life for the country to keep it save have to life as if there getting income support.
Is bad enough that the Housing offered to Soldiers and there family is worse then council Housing.

this should be changed,ASAP.No wonder Soldiers are leaving the Army and do something else only to support there family.
